topics.body:
So my grandparents, because they're old and retired, decided to buy me a couple bars of goat milk soap. 
Soap made out of goat milk....
And the weirdest part is, IT WORKS. My skin feels softer and more sensitive.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body: The even funnier part was when I told my family about it my step Dad got his flashlight went outside on our backyard balcony and shined a flashlight on them and asked "What the hell are you doing" and the guy literally said "_*I'm just trying to get some head man!*_"
